title: Excellent location
text: It is perfectly located near the Monastiraki metro station, and walking distance from the Acropolis Hill, Plaka area, and many more places to explore and visit during your stay there. Clean rooms, nice breakfast, reasonable prices.

title: Great accommodation
text: Our family of 4 stayed there for 2 nights before our departure back home. Very hospitable owner, a nice location to stay with the metro station being really close, and a free private transfer to the airport.

title: Nothing like the rest of Athens
text: Time has stopped in the old part of the Athens, and you feel you are in a completely different place.

title: Absolutely stunning
text: You have to go there to experience the feeling and the views. I got lucky to visit it early in the morning, before it got crowded. Everyone who visits Athens must go there.
